A. Ox39A7F8 to binary
3 - 0011
9 - 1001
A - 1010
7 - 0111
F - 1111
8 - 1000
001110011010011111111000

B. 1100100101111011 to hex
1100 - C
1001 - 9
0111 - 7
1011 - B
0xC97B

C. OxD5E4C to binary
D - 1101
5 - 0101
E - 1110
4 - 0100
C - 1100
11010101111001001100

D. 1001101110011110110101 to hex
0010 - 2
0110 - 6
1110 - E
0111 - 7
1011 - B
0101 - 5
0x26E7B5
